description.brazilian: Termine uma cena de caça-objetos em menos de um minuto.
description.english: Finish a Hidden Object scene in under one minute.
description.french: Terminez une scène d'objets cachés en moins d'une minute.
description.german: Löse eine Wimmelbildszene in unter einer Minute.
description.italian: Termina una Scena con Oggetti Nascosti in meno di un minuto.
description.japanese: 隠しオブジェクトシーンを1分以内にクリアする。
description.polish: Ukończ Scenę z Ukrytymi Obiektami w mniej niż minutę.
description.russian: Пройти задачу со скрытыми предметами быстрее, чем за минуту.
description.schinese: 一分钟内完成一个隐藏物品场景。
description.spanish: Completa una escena de objetos ocultos en menos de un minuto.

displayName.japanese: クイック・フィンガー

description.brazilian: Encontre três objetos escondidos em três segundos.
description.english: Find three hidden items in three seconds.
description.french: Trouvez les objets cachés en trois secondes.
description.german: Finde drei versteckte Objekte in drei Sekunden.
description.italian: Trova tre oggetti nascosti in tre secondi.
description.japanese: 隠されたアイテムを3秒以内に3つ見つける。
description.polish: Znajdź 3 Ukryte Obiekty w ciągu 3 sekund.
description.russian: Найти три скрытых предмета за 3 секунды.
description.schinese: 三秒内找出三件隐藏物品。
description.spanish: Encuentra tres objetos ocultos en tres segundos.

description.brazilian: Termine uma cena de caça-objetos sem pistas.
description.english: Finish a hidden object scene without a hint.
description.french: Terminez une scène d'objets cachés sans indices.
description.german: Schließ eine Wimmelbildszene ohne Tipp ab.
description.italian: Termina una scena con oggetti nascosti senza aiuti.
description.japanese: ヒントなしで隠しオブジェクトシーンをクリアする。
description.polish: Ukończ Scenę z Ukrytymi Obiektami bez użycia "Sugestii".
description.russian: Пройти задачу со скр. предметами без подсказок.
description.schinese: 没有提示的情况下完成一个隐藏物品场景。
description.spanish: Completa una escena de objetos ocultos sin usar pistas.

description.brazilian: Termine metade das cenas de caça-objetos sem pistas.
description.english: Finish half of the hidden objects scenes without a hint.
description.french: Terminez la moitié des scènes d'objets cachés sans indice.
description.german: Schließe die Hälfte aller Wimmelbildszenen ohne Tipp ab.
description.italian: Termina metà delle scene con oggetti nascosti senza aiuti.
description.japanese: ヒントなしで隠しオブジェクトシーンの半分をクリアする。
description.polish: Ukończ połowę Scen z Ukrytymi Obiektami bez użycia "Sugestii".
description.russian: Пройти половину задач со скр. предметами без подсказок.
description.schinese: 没有提示的情况下完成半数隐藏物品场景。
description.spanish: Completa la mitad de las escenas de objetos ocultos sin usar pistas.

description.brazilian: Termine todas as cenas de caça-objetos sem pistas.
description.english: Finish all of the hidden object scenes without a hint.
description.french: Terminez toutes les scènes d'objets cachés sans indice.
description.german: Schließe alle Wimmelbildszenen ohne Tipp ab.
description.italian: Termina tutte le scene con oggetti nascosti senza aiuti.
description.japanese: ヒントなしで隠しオブジェクトシーンを全部クリアする。
description.polish: Ukończ wszystkie Sceny z Ukrytymi Obiektami bez użycia "Sugestii".
description.russian: Пройти все задачи со скр. предметами без подсказок.
description.schinese: 没有提示的情况下完成所有隐藏物品场景。
description.spanish: Completa todas las escenas de objetos ocultos sin usar pistas.

description.brazilian: Resolva um quebra-cabeça em menos de um minuto.
description.english: Finish a puzzle in under a minute.
description.french: Terminez un puzzle en moins d'une minute.
description.german: Schließe ein Puzzle in unter einer Minute ab
description.italian: Termina un puzzle in meno di un minuto.
description.japanese: パズルを1分以内にクリアする
description.polish: Ukończ Łamigłówkę w mniej niż minutę.
description.russian: Решить головоломку менее чем за минуту.
description.schinese: 一分钟内完成一个谜题。
description.spanish: Resuelve un puzle en menos de un minuto.

description.brazilian: Resolva um quebra-cabeça sem pular.
description.english: Finish a puzzle without skipping.
description.french: Terminez un puzzle sans passer d'étape.
description.german: Schließe ein Puzzle ohne Überspringen ab.
description.italian: Termina un puzzle senza saltare.
description.japanese: スキップなしでパズルをクリアする。
description.schinese: 不跳过的情况下完成一个谜题。
description.spanish: Completa un puzle sin omitir.

description.brazilian: Termine metade dos quebra-cabeças sem pular.
description.english: Finish half of the puzzles without skipping.
description.french: Terminez la moitié des puzzle sans passer d'étape.
description.german: Schließe die Hälfte aller Puzzle ohne Überspringen ab.
description.italian: Termina metà dei puzzle senza saltare.
description.japanese: スキップなしでパズルの半分をクリアする。
description.russian: Решить половину головоломок, не пропуская их.
description.schinese: 不跳过的情况下完成半数谜题。
description.spanish: Completa la mitad de los puzles sin omitir.

description.brazilian: Termine todos os quebra-cabeças sem pular.
description.english: Finish all of the puzzles without skipping.
description.french: Terminez tous les puzzles sans passer d'étape.
description.german: Schließe alle Puzzle ohne Überspringen ab.
description.italian: Termina tutti i puzzle senza saltare.
description.japanese: スキップなしでパズルを全部クリアする。
description.russian: Решить все головоломки, не пропуская их.
description.schinese: 不跳过的情况下完成所有谜题。
description.spanish: Completa todos los puzles sin omitir.

description.brazilian: Libere a entrada secreta para o museu.
description.english: Unlock the secret entrance to the museum.
description.french: Débloquez l'entrée secrète du musée.
description.german: Öffne den Geheimeingang zum Museum.
description.italian: Sblocca l'entrata segreta del museo.
description.japanese: 博物館への秘密の入り口のロックを解除する
description.schinese: 解锁博物馆的秘密入口
description.spanish: Desbloquea la entrada secreta para entrar en el museo.

displayName.japanese: ロイヤル・グリフィン

description.brazilian: Encontre a espada lendária da Ordem do Grifo.
description.english: Find the legendary ship of the Order of the Griffin.
description.french: Trouvez le vaisseau légendaire de l'Ordre du Griffon.
description.german: Finde das legendäre Schiff des Ordens des Greifen
description.italian: Trova la leggendaria nave dell'Ordine del Grifone.
description.japanese: グリフィン騎士団の伝説の船を探し出す
description.schinese: 找到狮鹫组织传说中的船只
description.spanish: Encuentra el legendario barco de la Orden del Grifo.

description.brazilian: Viaje para o passado.
description.english: Travel back in time.
description.french: Voyagez dans le passé.
description.german: Reise in der Zeit zurück.
description.italian: Viaggia indietro nel tempo.
description.japanese: 時間を遡って旅する。
description.spanish: Viaja al pasado.

description.brazilian: Faça um antídoto.
description.english: Brew up a healing potion.
description.french: Concocte une potion curative.
description.german: Braue einen Heiltrank.
description.italian: Crea una pozione curativa
description.japanese: 治癒薬を生成する
description.spanish: Crea una poción curativa.

description.brazilian: Complete as 5 faces do medalhão.
description.english: Complete the 5 Faces Medallion.
description.french: Complétez le médaillon à 5 faces.
description.german: Setze das Fünf-Gesichter-Medaillon zusammen.
description.italian: Completa il Medaglione a 5 Facce.
description.japanese: 顔のメダリオンを5つ完成させる
description.spanish: Completa el medallón de las 5 caras.

description.brazilian: Liberte o prisioneiro.
description.english: Break out the prisoner.
description.french: Libérez le prisonnier
description.german: Befreie den Gefangenen.
description.italian: Fai evadere il prigioniero
description.japanese: 囚人を脱出させる
description.spanish: Libera al prisionero

description.brazilian: Abra o Portão dos Campeões.
description.english: Open the Gate of Champions.
description.french: Ouvrez le portail des champions.
description.german: Öffne das Tor der Helden.
description.italian: Apri il Cancello dei Campioni.
description.japanese: チャンピオンの門を開ける
description.spanish: Abre la Puerta de los Campeones.

description.brazilian: Derrote o rei do gelo.
description.english: Defeat the King of Ice.
description.french: Combattez le roi de glace.
description.german: Besiege den Eiskönig.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il re del ghiaccio
description.japanese: 氷の王を倒す
description.spanish: Derrota al rey del hielo.

description.brazilian: Derrote a rainha do fogo.
description.english: Defeat the Queen of Fire.
description.french: Combattez la reine de glace.
description.german: Besiege die Feuerkönigin.
description.italian: Sconfiggi la regina del fuoco
description.japanese: 火の女王を倒す
description.spanish: Derrota a la reina del fuego.

description.brazilian: Abra os portões do templo.
description.english: Open the gates of the temple.
description.french: Ouvrez le portail du temple
description.german: Öffne die Tempeltore.
description.italian: Apri i cancelli del tempio.
description.japanese: 寺院の門を開ける
description.spanish: Abre las puertas del templo.

description.brazilian: Mergulhe no oceano profundo.
description.english: Dive into the ocean deep.
description.french: Plongez au plus profond de l'océan.
description.german: Tauche in die Tiefsee hinab
description.italian: Immergiti nell'oceano.
description.japanese: 深海へ潜る
description.spanish: Sumérgete en el océano.

description.brazilian: Use a tocha draconiana para dominar o dragão.
description.english: Use the Dragon Torch to subdue the dragon.
description.french: Utilisez la torche dragon pour subjuger le dragon
description.german: Benutze die Drachenfackel, um den Drachen zu besiegen.
description.italian: Usa la Torcia del Drago per domare il drago.
description.japanese: ドラゴントーチを使いドラゴンに打ち勝つ
description.polish: Użyj Smoczej Pochodni, by poskromić smoka.
description.russian: Усмирить дракона с помощью драконьего факела.
description.spanish: Usa la antorcha del dragón para domarlo.

description.brazilian: Chegue até a Base da Ordem do Grifo.
description.english: Arrive at the HQ of the Order of the Griffin.
description.french: Arrivez au QG de l'Ordre du Griffon.
description.german: Erreiche das Hauptquartier des Ordens des Greifen.
description.italian: Raggiungi la sede dell'Ordine del Grifone
description.japanese: グリフィン騎士団の本部にたどり着く
description.spanish: Entra en el cuartel general de la Orden del Grifo.

description.brazilian: Descubra o segredo do velho canhão.
description.english: Explore the secret of the old cannon.
description.french: Explorez le secret du vieux canon
description.german: Löse das Rätsel der alten Kanone.
description.italian: Cerca il segreto del vecchio cannone.
description.japanese: 古代の大砲の秘密を探る
description.spanish: Explora el secreto del viejo cañón.

description.brazilian: Pare o ritual.
description.english: Stop the ritual.
description.french: Arrêtez le rituel.
description.german: Beende das Ritual.
description.italian: Ferma il rituale.
description.japanese: 儀式を止める
description.spanish: Detén el ritual.
